overview: Min-ho wants passionate sex and his wife Eun-kyeong says sex is just a verification of love.  Min-ho wants unique sex again tonight but Eun-kyeong only wants the usual sex in bed.  One day, Eun-kyeong gets sex toys at work. She doesn't like them at first but she can't get over the great feeling from the massage shop and starts touching herself. Min-ho sees this and he gets horny. In the end, they have sex that they will never forget.
title: The Invited Man
